一、課程目標Aims of the Course：

本課程旨在引導博士生進入地理研究的「未知領域」，尤其關注研究歷程與博士論文先期階段的幾項核心議題：包括研究問題的「問題意識」、理論觀點的辯證批判、研究假說與研究設計、以及預期成果等等，為提擬博士論文的計畫書預作準備。

The aim of the course is to introduce the PhD students to the “_terra incognita_” of geographical research. In doing so, we will focus on the building blocks of research process and thesis writing, including the problematic of research questions, their theoretical points of view, research hypothesis and research design, and the outcomes to be achieved, etc. Hopefully, this will pave their ways to the proposal of the PhD thesis.

二、課程設計Curriculum Design

作為地理系EMI課程的一部分，本課程將全程以英文授課，並以同學報告、師生共同討論的研討方式進行。

As a part of the EMI course in the department of geography, this course will be taught in English via an extensive and intensive engagement of discussion led by PhD students and the teacher – the seminar. 

三、指定教材Textbooks：

本課程並無指定教材。

No textbooks will be used in this course.

四、 實施方式Ways of Teaching：

同學報告、教師補充、課堂討論。

Oral presentations, discussions, and seminars.
